title: Good Food Concepts, LLC. Recalls Beef Products Due To Possible E. Coli O26 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 7, 2017 Good Food Concepts, LLC., a Colorado Springs, Colo. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,290 pounds of raw intact and non-intact beef because the products may be contaminated with E. coli O26, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS)...

establishment.name: Good Food Concepts, LLC
establishment.address:
4635 Town Center Dr. 
  Colorado Springs, CO 80916

impacted_products: Various weights of individual packages of “CALLICRATE BEEF, Celebrate goodness, Celebrate life, Filet Mignon,” with lot code 170731CC.
